dmca.title: FW: [ABUSE] URGENT: Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, December 18, 2004 12:59 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] URGENT: Notice of Copyright Infringement

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Forwarding to Legal for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Rosenfield, Kevin (SEA) <KRosenfield@prestongates.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Tuesday, December 14, 2004, 8:02:29 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] URGENT: Notice of Copyright Infringement

===8<==============Original message text===============

I am an attorney for Valve Corporation.  Thank you for your prompt
attention to this matter.  I look forward to your confirmation that the
infringing material has been removed from your systems.

 <<KA1RL20C1==Planet DMCA.doc>>

Kevin A. Rosenfield
PrestonlGateslEllis LLP

925 Fourth Ave, Suite 2900
Seattle, Washington  98104-1158

Phone        (206) 370-6586 (direct)
Fax        (206) 370-6309 (direct)

email        krosenfield@prestongates.com


===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFBw9U2vK/XpJs6oyURAm1MAJ9osG0va/cUEDpfJntR8fIeZH5sCwCfbrxT
ljvjyF9KM2etihya2uT85jY=
=xpzh
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
dmca.principal_name: Preston Gates and Ellis LLP (for Valve Corporation)
